actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish a Mildred and Claude Pepper Scholarship Program.
short_title: Mildred and Claude Pepper Scholarship Act

summary.text: Mildred and Claude Pepper Scholarship Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to make grants to the Washington Workshops Foundation to establish and maintain the Mildred and Claude Pepper Scholarship Program. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Mildred and Claude Pepper Scholarship Act
A bill to establish a Mildred and Claude Pepper Scholarship Program.
